name: Advance Chart Addon for Elementor – WPTD
author: wpthemedevelopers

sections.description:
The #1 Advance Chart Addon for Elementor

WPTD Chart is advanced elementor chart plugin. Convert easily data into chart. We gives you 4 models of charts example: pie chart, line chart, doughnut chart, bar chart. Also you can control chart legend details. In future we planned to give more chart types as free.

Rate

  • Please rate the plugin
  • Read people reviews

The Features

Pie chart, line chart, doughnut chart, bar chart and many features:
Also you can convert data into chart as we mentioned some examples below

  1. Student data into chart.
  2. Trade details into chart.
  3. Medicine details into chart.
  4. Hospitals details into chart.
  5. Doctors details into chart
  6. Any theme support
  7. Easy to Use.
  8. Customizing the width, height and legend position for the chart.

Live Demo

  • WPTD Chart Live Demo

Contact Us for More Works

  • WordPress Theme Developers
  • Wide News Hub
  • EMI Calculator Plugin Work Sample
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload ‘wptd-chart’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Now read How of Use
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No. You cannot use without Elementor since itâ€™s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! It will work with any theme where Elementor works.

Can I extend the plugin or options?

Absolutely! Feel free contact us. We can upgrade or create plugins.
